ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is how We recompense good-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is how We reward those who do good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus do We reward the good-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus, do We reward the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how We reward the virtuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus indeed do We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus do We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so We recompense the good-doers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus do We reward the good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: That is how We recompense the righteous:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! thus We compense the well-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thus do We reward the virtuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus indeed do We reward the Muhsinun (good-doers - see V. 2:112).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such We recompense the gooddoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:110] So, in way that We rewarded him, do We reward those who are virtuous, to their own souls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus do We reward the good) with good praise and safety.
